meanings.definition: A type of fatty acid found in palm oil and animal fats.
meanings.sent1: Palmitins are important components of palm oil.
meanings.sent2: I learned that palmitins are present in animal fats.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a dash of palmitins to the recipe, giving it a rich flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed as if it were infused with palmitins, radiating a healthy shine.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the effects of palmitins on the body's metabolism.
